                                   java.util.List<PlayerColor> kills,
                                   java.util.List<PlayerColor> overkills)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Load game board
        Parameters:
        board - Board to initialize
        targetKills - Kills target of the game
        activePlayerColor - Actual active player
        remainingActions - Remaining actions in this turn
        turnNumber - Actual turn number
        players - Players in the game
        kills - Actual kills done
        overkills - Actual overkills done
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if fxml is not found
